H3.text: What was the name of the 'Birdman of Alcatraz'. Robert Stroud

A4.text: Robert Franklin Stroud (January 28, 1890 â€“ November 21, 1963), known as the 'Birdman of Alcatraz'.

A5.text: Stroud was the subject of a book by Thomas E. Gaddis, Birdman of Alcatraz, published in 1955.
